doc.title: Fate
doc.plot: When two innocent 17year old girls talk about visiting a psychic neither of them knew it would be their first steps on a chilling journey. While Lucy's reading gives her all the answers she wants to hear, Rachael's soon turns as the dark and mysterious Romana sees visions of death before her 18th birthday. Â Soon after the reading a paranoid Rachael begins to have unexplainable sightings including strange ghostly figures and the image of her dead father. Rachael's physical and mental state deteriorates in the week approaching her predicted Judgement Day with one question constantly being asked...is Romana the psychic just a charlatan or is there a chilling truth to her predictions?
